original_title: アナウンサーよりも天職! 究極奉仕初ソープ
overview: Former local station announcer Aika Yamagishi changes jobs to Miss Soap! "I'm thrilled just for the first time." Still, the service sex of a beautiful woman who loves sex is a first-class item! We will send you a full course of 3 productions, including scrubbing scrubbing brush, a periscope that keeps staring at you, a service that licks up to anal, and a lotion mat with training! "I'm supposed to be serving, but I feel a lot better!"
title: She Used To Be An Announcer, But This Was What She Was Born To Do! Her First Ever Ultimate Soapland Service Aika Yamagishi
